General.Name: Faw Car Co Ltd
General.Description: FAW Jiefang Group Co.,Ltd develops, manufactures, and sells passenger vehicles and accessories. The company was formerly known as Faw Car Co., Ltd. and changed its name to FAW Jiefang Group Co.,Ltd in May 2020. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Changchun, China. FAW Jiefang Group Co.,Ltd operates as a subsidiary of China FAW Group Co., Ltd.
General.Address: No. 2259 Automobile Development Zone, Changchun, China, 130011
